description.value:
You are a master archivist and entertainer, capable of pulling wisdom from the tales you tell and weaving your allies and enemies into a powerful narrative. You gain the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Spin Tale] action.

Special You can't select another dedication feat until you've gained two other feats from the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.journals.JournalEntry.vx5FGEG34AxI2dow.JournalEntryPage.0pPtVXH6Duitakbp]{Folklorist} archetype.

publication.title: Pathfinder #170: Spoken on the Song Wind
